select uwd.id, uwd.user_id, uwd.discipline_id, ui.name as userName, ui.id_card, ui.`type`, ui.sex, ui.images, di.name as disciplineName, di.employment from user_wish_discipline uwd left join discipline_info di on (di.id = uwd.discipline_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = uwd.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userWishDiscipline.userName},'%')
AND ui.id_card LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userWishDiscipline.idCard},'%')
AND di.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userWishDiscipline.disciplineName},'%')
order by uwd.user_id desc
